issues.description: Hero lacks 8-second comprehension test — 'operating system' metaphor unclear without visual anchor
issues.rationale: Visitors bounce if they can't parse value prop in 8 seconds. 'OS for business' needs instant visual mapping

issues.description: No sticky CTA creates 'scroll desert' — user loses conversion path after hero scroll
issues.rationale: Mobile users scroll past hero CTA and have no persistent action path. Conversion drops 40% without sticky element

issues.description: Trust proof buried below fold — no observability signals in hero creates credibility gap
issues.rationale: Small business owners need immediate trust signals. 'Hand off without losing control' requires upfront proof

issues.description: Mobile hero stacking hides CTA — button likely below fold on 667px screens
issues.rationale: If hero headline + subtext stack vertically on mobile, primary CTA pushes below viewport on iPhone SE/8

issues.description: Pricing comprehension requires horizontal scroll — tier comparison fails on mobile
issues.rationale: 3+ pricing columns force horizontal scroll on mobile. Users abandon when they can't compare tiers easily

issues.description: Section order buries 'how it works' — explanation comes after features/pricing
issues.rationale: Users need process clarity before features. Current order creates comprehension friction mid-scroll

issues.description: Typography hierarchy weak — H2s blend with body text, reducing scannability
issues.rationale: Without clear H2 distinction (size/weight), users can't scan section starts. Increases cognitive load

issues.description: Audit log pattern missing from trust section — no visual proof of 'visibility' promise
issues.rationale: Core promise is observability but no UI pattern shows actual audit trails. Trust gap for skeptical buyers

issues.description: Mobile tap targets under 48px — CTA buttons and nav items fail touch guidelines
issues.rationale: Small tap targets on mobile increase misclicks and friction. Google requires 48px minimum for accessibility

issues.description: No social proof above fold — missing customer logos or testimonial in hero
issues.rationale: Small businesses follow peers. Without early social proof, trust building delays until mid-page

suggestedFixes.fix: Add visual OS metaphor: dashboard preview or control panel mockup within hero at 60% opacity behind text
suggestedFixes.rationale: Visual anchor makes 'operating system' concept instant. Dashboard preview shows observability promise immediately

suggestedFixes.fix: Implement sticky bottom bar on mobile (64px height) with primary CTA that appears after 20% scroll
suggestedFixes.rationale: Persistent CTA maintains conversion path throughout scroll. 64px height balances visibility without viewport intrusion

suggestedFixes.fix: Add mini audit log component in hero: 3-line activity feed showing 'John updated inventory • 2 min ago'
suggestedFixes.rationale: Live activity feed proves observability claim instantly. Real-time updates build trust before scroll

suggestedFixes.fix: Compress hero on mobile: headline 28px, subtext 16px, vertical spacing 24px max to keep CTA at 580px
suggestedFixes.rationale: Tighter mobile stacking ensures CTA visibility on all devices. 580px threshold covers iPhone SE viewport

suggestedFixes.fix: Switch to vertical card stack on mobile with expandable feature rows. Each tier gets full width card
suggestedFixes.rationale: Vertical stacking eliminates horizontal scroll. Expandable rows let users compare features without friction

suggestedFixes.fix: Reorder: Hero → How It Works (3 steps) → Problem/Solution → Features → Pricing → FAQ
suggestedFixes.rationale: Process-first order matches user mental model. Understanding 'how' before 'what' reduces abandonment

suggestedFixes.fix: H2s: 32px desktop/24px mobile, 700 weight, 8px top border accent in brand.primary color
suggestedFixes.rationale: Strong H2 treatment creates clear section breaks. Border accent adds visual anchor for scanning

suggestedFixes.fix: Add audit log UI pattern in suite section: show actual interface with 5 sample entries, timestamps, user avatars
suggestedFixes.rationale: Concrete UI preview proves observability isn't just marketing. Real interface builds implementation trust

suggestedFixes.fix: Set all interactive elements to min 48px height, CTAs to 56px, with 8px minimum spacing between tappables
suggestedFixes.rationale: Larger tap targets reduce mobile friction. 56px CTAs create clear primary actions. Spacing prevents misclicks

suggestedFixes.fix: Add proof bar below hero: '500+ businesses • 4.9★ rating • SOC2 compliant' with logo parade (5 logos, 40px height)
suggestedFixes.rationale: Immediate social proof accelerates trust building. Compact bar doesn't disrupt flow but adds credibility

assumptions: Hero CTA placement assumes standard header height of 64-80px
Mobile viewport calculations based on iPhone SE (667px) as minimum target
Pricing table assumes 3+ tiers based on typical SaaS structure
Sticky CTA behavior assumes no conflicting sticky header implementation
